Type.BattleDialog: Oh my, ingredients end up getting overly tender if we drag on too much!
Woooow~ I wonder how you guys taste? Can I cut a chunk off of you?
Hey, you there! You smelled so nice when I passed by you just before.
Tsk, all I got were books! These don’t even look chewy!
Hmm… No, no. Maybe we can make brand new ingredients out of these?
Hah…! I never thought… I’d be an ingredient… myself once in my life.
Jack… You can’t leave me like this. You should’ve been careful. You promised to be with me.
Waaay to weak, aren’t you! I bet the taste won’t be any good, either.
Meh, you can’t just turn into a book. Should I try making book steak or something?
I should’ve flaked a few slices off you if I knew you’d turn into something like this!
…I wasn’t planning to join ‘The Eight Chefs’ alone anyway. It’s… better off this way.
…You guys are humans, right? Even if you aren’t, we welcome new ingredients.
It’s for the sake of Pierre’s goal…
Careful not to bruise ‘em too much… Gotta keep the ingredients in top quality.
Thank goodness we won, Pierre. Let’s take the stuff and go back, shall we?
If we happen to find a good book here, we’ll grab the attention of ‘The Eight Chefs’ in no time, right?
Sorry, Pierre… I should have been… stronger…
…What about the promise you made with me.
What would a pie made out of this guy taste like…?
Chopping you feels way different from the usual ingredients we find in the Backstreets.
You smelled nice just like Pierre said. What a shame.
If I can’t help you any longer, then it might be better off for me to follow you there.
